body: Is this like predator x terraformers but porn?
The art is good, tentacles are just boring.
Story's decent. Art is a bit turn-off. Could be better. The tit sizes are inconsistent. I don't mean any hate to the artist, I myself suck at drawing. Just a friendly feedback.
exactly why you DON'T mess with genetics to create weapons. who's idea was it to create monsters with the best of all creatures in the universe. of course they're going to take over humans

"You will be carrying my children."                                                                                                                                                                                                          just like you will be paying child support
I like this one more as they don't completely become a mindless broken sex slaves at least not in the end part but a slow yet thrilling change. Good to see a new approach for once
